General.Name: Globalfoundries Inc
General.Description: GlobalFoundries Inc., a semiconductor foundry, provides range of mainstream wafer fabrication services and technologies worldwide. It offers semiconductor devices, including microprocessors, mobile application processors, baseband processors, network processors, radio frequency modems, microcontrollers, and power management units. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Malta, New York.
General.Address: 400 Stonebreak Road Extension, Malta, NY, United States, 12020
